Package com.kewargs.cs309.core.utils.backend.request

Class JsonRequestCall

java.lang.Object
com.kewargs.cs309.core.utils.backend.request.AbstractRequest<String,JsonRequestCall>
com.kewargs.cs309.core.utils.backend.request.JsonRequestCall
All Implemented Interfaces:
RequestCall<String,JsonRequestCall>
public class JsonRequestCall extends AbstractRequest<String,JsonRequestCall>
A concrete implementation of AbstractRequest for JSON requests. This class allows for building a Volley StringRequest with a JSON body. It includes methods for setting the request body and building the actual request to be sent over the network.
